name: CVE-2000-0059
description: PHP3 with safe_mode enabled does not properly filter shell metacharacters from commands that are executed by popen, which could allow remote attackers to execute commands.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.13:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.12:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:php:php:3.0.9:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
